cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 40 mi southeast of St. Croix
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the Greater Antilles, forecast to enter the Gulf of Mexico then turn north toward the north-western Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-western Gulf Coast (near the Louisiana/Texas border)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Puerto Rico, U.S. & British Virgin Islands, northern & southern coasts of the Dominican Republic, northern Haiti, southeastern Bahamas, Turks & Caicos (tropical-storm warnings)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola, Cuba, Bahamas, later the northern Gulf Coast from Texas to Mississippi
weather_observation.wind: Only a 3 % cumulative chance of tropical-storm-force (â‰¥34 kt) winds at the port through the next 5 days; strong winds are unlikely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected based on current track and low wind probabilities.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer peripheral bands may bring light rain; heavy rainfall is not expected.
